name: Heroine Dusk
description:
The sun has not returned in several days. Evil forces are using the safety of night to invade. Take up arms to fight against the darkness.

A classic RPG dungeon crawl Demo. Playable with mouse or touch. Works in most modern browsers.

Keyboard controls are also supported, unless you're playing the game in an iframe. Try downloading a copy of the game, or play at the game's original homepage at http://heroinedusk.com

This game demo is free! The code is GPL licensed and the art is CC-BY-SA licensed, all created and released by me (Clint Bellanger).

The music is by composer Yu Batake and is CC-BY licensed.
